steps.prompt: Great — I can help with this. Can you let me know who I’m speaking with?
Just so I can point you in the right direction, what would you say your main concern is with the debts?
Roughly how much do you pay towards all debts each month, and what would feel affordable for you? For example: “I pay £600 and could afford £200.”
Is there anything urgent we should know about — like enforcement/bailiff action, court or default notices, or missed priority bills (rent, council tax, utilities)?
Before we proceed, there’s no obligation to act on any advice today, and there are free sources of debt advice available at MoneyHelper. Shall we carry on?
I can set up your secure Client Portal so you can add details, upload documents, and check progress. Shall I open it now?
While you’re in the portal, I’ll stay here to guide you. Once you’ve saved your details, just say “done” and we’ll continue.
